Let's Talk About Me

Hello, I’m Lexis von Seggern a Front End Designer and Developer from Lincoln Nebraska. I create beautiful websites for any ocasion.

I love the web. You’ll find me most excited when creating beautiful websites with clear and enjoyable user experiences.

Really I enjoy each part of the process, from sitting down with a team to figure out the specs to admiring each feature of the project as it’s finally finished.

There is so much to be interested in, to learn about, and to pour one’s creativity into. After designing, drawing, and coding, I spend time reading all sorts of books, (especially ones with adventure), travelling, experimenting with fashion, building my vynal collection, and jamming out to all kinds of music.

02

What I Do

I’m currently a full-time student and am passionately learning all things web development in school and in my spare time. Right now, I’m digging into Wordpress, that’s just first on my list.

My time in the Graphic Design | Media Arts program at SCC confirmed that I’ve always loved to design and develop. It was there I found my passion for the web and all that entails to create a successful website.

Let's Talk About You

What started as an idea soon became a reality. Buildertrend is changing the way construction companies are managing projects. With Buildertrend’s software, companies are able to build more projects faster, reduce costly communication errors, and provide the ultimate customer satisfaction. Super cool and innovative.
